text: Sir Garfield St Aubrun Sobers aka Gary Sobers (born 28 July 1936 in Bridgetown, Barbados) is a former West Indian cricketer. He is widely regarded as cricket's greatest-ever all-rounder, having been a brilliant left-handed batter, an outstanding fielder, and a highly effective bowler who used all varieties of left-arm bowling from spin to fast. Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Barbadian cricketers
title: Garfield Sobers
